flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Fist of all this hack is legal as well as safe. Also, this mod will not mess with the original PSP software. It is not actually the real Mac software but it is an emulator (simulator). All that you need is a PSP, a PSP cord that plugs into a computer, and a computer.
guide.introduction_rendered:
Fist of all this hack is legal as well as safe. Also, this mod will not mess with the original PSP software. It is not actually the real Mac software but it is an emulator (simulator). All that you need is a PSP, a PSP cord that plugs into a computer, and a computer.

Tools
  • Computer
  • PSP computer cord
  • Winzip program
  • sony PSP

lines.text: First of all you need to download WinZip at http://winzip.com. This program comes in a trial version that has all the functionality you need.
lines.text_raw: First of all you need to download WinZip at http://winzip.com. This program comes in a trial version that has all the functionality you need.

lines.text: After WinZip is set up, you need to go to http://www.x5.psp3d.com and download the Mac software.
lines.text_raw: After WinZip is set up, you need to go to http://www.x5.psp3d.com and download the Mac software.

lines.text: Now plug your PSP into the computer.
lines.text_raw: Now plug your PSP into the computer.

lines.text: Once you PSP has connected to the computer, a box will pop up to tell you it's plugged in. You need to open the folder shown.
lines.text_raw: Once you PSP has connected to the computer, a box will pop up to tell you it's plugged in. You need to open the folder shown.

lines.text: Once the folder is opened, you need to click on PSP, and then "Common". Then drag the X5 folder to the Common folder.
lines.text_raw: Once the folder is opened, you need to click on PSP, and then "Common". Then drag the X5 folder to the Common folder.

lines.text: Next you need to go back to the PSP folder, then to the pictures folder and put the X5 picture in that.
lines.text_raw: Next you need to go back to the PSP folder, then to the pictures folder and put the X5 picture in that.

lines.text: Once you've completed the last step, you need to unplug your PSP and go into the Internet browser.
lines.text_raw: Once you've completed the last step, you need to unplug your PSP and go into the Internet browser.

lines.text: In the address bar type in: <tt>file:///PSP/COMMON/X5/index.ht<wbr />ml</tt>
lines.text_raw: In the address bar type in: ``file:///PSP/COMMON/X5/index.html``

lines.text: This will bring you to the Mac OS emulator. Now before you forget the web address, add it to your bookmarks so that you can use it anytime!
lines.text_raw: This will bring you to the Mac OS emulator. Now before you forget the web address, add it to your bookmarks so that you can use it anytime!

lines.text: This program was NOT created by me even though I am creating a How-to guide for it. copyright goes to KaotiK DesignZ. All rights reserved.
lines.text_raw: This program was NOT created by me even though I am creating a How-to guide for it. copyright goes to KaotiK DesignZ. All rights reserved.

lines.text: For more of my How-to's visit my YouTube page or check out my other articles on this site!
lines.text_raw: For more of my How-to's visit [http://www.youtube.com/nwilson126|my YouTube page] or check out my other articles on this site!

guide.summary: Run Mac OS on a PSP. You can impress all your friends with your Mac/PSP mod.
guide.time_required: 15 to 30 minutes depending on computer experience
guide.title: How to Run Mac OS on a PSP
